title: Haunters of the deep
creator_credit: Longbow Film Company, Children's Film and Television Foundation, Gordon L.T. Scott and Andrew Bogle
brief_description: In Cornwall, England a big American company is about to re-open an abandoned tin mine, despite being warned against it. At the turn of the century the mine caved in and many miners were trapped beneath the surface. A ghost is sighted by a local boy - it is the ghost of one of the people trapped during the cave-in and it is trying to warn of disaster.
creator_credit_for_label: Longbow Film Company, Children’s Film and Television Foundation, Gordon L.T. Scott and Andrew Bogle
